article_title: Shelter From the Storm offers variety of residential shelters to help in case of tornadoes, disastrous weather
article_text:
Norman, OK (73070)

Today

Gusty winds with scattered afternoon thunderstorms. A few storms may be severe. High 83F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms in the evening. Cloudy skies overnight. A few storms may be severe. Low near 65F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

article_metadata.author: Doug Hill For The Transcript

og.description: Severe weather season is right around the corner and Carl Brown has the solution for your physical safety and peace of mind. Along with co-owner Don Miller, he operates Shelter
